wikipedia_page.main: Shaun Raymond Came (born 15 June 1983) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Macclesfield Town. He also played non-league football for clubs including Northwich Victoria and Winsford United. He is the son of former footballer Mark Came.

response: His son Shaun Came has played professionally for Macclesfield Town.
